                                   CommunoteInstallerException

        Create the Communote account (aka the global client).
        Specified by:
        createCommunoteAccount in interface CommunoteInstaller
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account
        timezoneId - the ID of the timezone
        Throws:
        InvalidClientIdException - in case the configured ID of the global client is not valid
        CommunoteInstallerException - in case creating the client failed

      • initializeCommunoteAccount

        public void initializeCommunoteAccount(UserVO adminAccount,
                                       Map<ApplicationProperty,String> params)
                                throws EmailValidationException,
                                       ConfigurationInitializationException,
                                       CommunoteInstallerException
        Description copied from interface: CommunoteInstaller
        Initialize the Communote account (aka global client) that was previously created with CommunoteInstaller.createCommunoteAccount(String, String)
        Specified by:
        initializeCommunoteAccount in interface CommunoteInstaller
        Parameters:
        adminAccount - VO with details of the first Communote user with administrative privileges
        params - application parameters to initialize the Communote account with
        Throws:
        EmailValidationException - in case the email address of the administrator user is invalid
        ConfigurationInitializationException - in case the provided application parameters caused an error
        CommunoteInstallerException - in case the initialization failed

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        statusCallback - the callback to receive status updates
        Returns:

                                                Map<CoreConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
                                         throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Description copied from interface: CommunoteInstaller
        Update the database settings and return the resulting configuration.
        Specified by:
        updateDatabaseSettings in interface CommunoteInstaller
        Parameters:
        dbType - the database type
        settings - the settings like host and username for connecting to the database of the given type

        the new configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - in case the configuration cannot be saved
